title: Is this the first member of the Caravan to be granted asylum in the United States?
subtitle: A cynical attempt to discredit asylum-seekers in the 2018 "Cavan" of immigrants is in fact a 2009 picture from a pornographic website.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: There is Mimi who claims to contain a photograph of a Honduran asylum seeker and a member of the Caravan named Susana González, who offers the first woman to obtain asylum in the United States in that group.
